name: generate_pdf
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool web_capture.
Tool description: Take screenshots of any website or generate a pdf either from the website or an HTML file.
API description: Generates a PDF by capturing a screenshot of the provided website URL with specified dimensions using the Web Capture API.

width.description: The width of the screenshot in pixels. Defaults to 1024.

height.description: The height of the screenshot in pixels. Defaults to 780.

url.description: The URL of the website to capture. Defaults to 'https://google.com'.
